name: Block Assault (Splitz)
description:
Race for your life in this fun assault course based game where you beat the course in the quickest time possible!

With 3 starting levels to choose from and more to come in future updates, race against the clock and avoid the many obstacles and challenges in each level!

Have fun and don't fall off the track!

Controls:

W - Accelerate

S - Reverse

A + D - Steer

Space - Brake

R - Reset car

Escape - Pause game
